items.name: case round
items.desc: A join with a rounded end. Core Graphics draws the line to extend beyond the endpoint of the path. The line ends with a semicircular arc with a radius of 1/2 the line’s width, centered on the endpoint.

items.name: case bevel
items.desc: A join with a squared-off end. Core Graphics draws the line to extend beyond the endpoint of the path, for a distance of 1/2 the line’s width.
